definition: to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)

sentences.english: He suggested that tangling fishing gear should be made a criminal offence.
sentences.chinese: 他提議，纏繞捕魚器材應該算刑事犯罪。

sentences.english: From that day on, the Klatooinians were property of the Hutt criminal empire.
sentences.chinese: 從那以後，克拉圖因人便歸屬於赫特人的犯罪帝國。

sentences.english: Offenses with this characteristic usually will be encountered as assimilative crimes.
sentences.chinese: 帶有此特徵的犯罪行爲通常將視爲同等犯罪。

sentences.english: Offenses with this characteristic usually will be encountered as assimilative crimes.
sentences.chinese: 帶有此特徵的犯罪行爲通常將視爲同等犯罪。

sentences.english: "The actions of one soldier were nothing more than criminal behavior," Hammond said.
sentences.chinese: “這名士兵的行爲是實實在在的犯罪，”哈蒙德說。

sentences.english: Fourth, the failure is beyond the unit's will.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪行爲未達既遂是由於單位意志以外的原因。

sentences.english: The criminal personality plays an important role in severely violent crimes.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪人格在嚴重暴力犯罪中起着重要作用。

sentences.english: The criminal personality plays an important role in severely violent crimes.

sentences.english: Thereby , the basis of penal responsibility of ministration defect sin is varied .
sentences.chinese: 職務過失犯罪刑事責任的根據呈多元性的特點。

sentences.english: Cultural garbage is the main reason to bring out youngsters crime.
sentences.chinese: 文化垃圾是誘發青少年犯罪的重要原因。

sentences.english: In joint offense has transitional form of crimes, also exists surplus behavior.
sentences.chinese: 共同犯罪中既存在轉化犯，也存在過限問題。

sentences.english: In order to construct harmonious society, it is necessary to try to decrease the recidivism rate.
sentences.chinese: 建設和諧社會，儘量降低重新犯罪率是必要的。

sentences.english: A young policeman has been accused of conspiring with a gang of criminals.
sentences.chinese: 一名年輕警察被指控與一個犯罪集團相勾結。

sentences.english: Objective To probe into the psychological state of criminal adolescences from the single child families.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討獨生子犯罪者心理狀況。

sentences.english: Our intelligent crime has been very outstanding.
sentences.chinese: 我國的智能化犯罪已經十分突出。

sentences.english: International human-rights lawyers say these types of killings would likely constitute a war crime.
sentences.chinese: 國際人權律師說，這種殺人行爲可能會構成犯罪。

definition: to repeatedly commit an offense/repeat offender/habitual criminal/recidivist/recidivism
to commit a crime or offence
